attributes.action: STOP  MLA’S  SALARIES  until they get back in Government
attributes.background:
It is ridiculous to think that people are receiving full pay without doing any work.   This would not happen in any other business.
The total amount of these salaries would go some way to helping the Health Service and Education.

rejection.details:
The salaries of MLAs are the responsibility of the Northern Ireland Assembly, not the UK Government or Parliament. Salaries are determined by the Independent Financial Review Panel. You can find out more about the IFRP here:

http://ifrp.org.uk/
